website_summaries.verdict: A well-built, lightweight aluminum die grinder that features speeds that are adjustable up to 25,000 RPM.
pros: DEWALT's powerful pneumatic die grinder has a cushioned ergonomic grip for comfort and to help reduce vibrations
The throttle lever has a trigger lock button for added safety
The tool comes with a three-year limited warranty, so you can purchase with confidence
cons: This grinder may work with an adapter sold separately from another company, but it does not come with an eighth-inch collet

website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive air die grinder gets top marks for its long lifespan, ability to get into hard-to-reach places, and simple storage.
pros: Compact size makes this air die grinder easy to store in any space
Small size allows access to tight areas while working
Proves to be a durable model that lasts through many uses

customer_reviews.title: 2 (hard) years and counting!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it roughly 2 years ago I work in a weld shop repairing various things. I frequently use it to grind out cracks in materials, locate cracks, grind small holes to tolerance, or clean up weld in tight corners. So far I would say it has earned its keep in my toolbox and been one of the better purchases I’ve made. Oil frequently, and the lower unit wants to unscrew so I put lock tight on and been happy ever since. It is starting to show some play in the bearings but it’s outlasted soooo many other die grinders in our shop I can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas in TN

customer_reviews.title: The plastic seemed like a good idea when I bought it
customer_reviews.text: The plastic seemed like a good idea when I bought it, less shock when I let it drop. However cleaning it from its messy encounter leaved little to be desired. Almost I'm possible to wipe it due to the textured finish. Also on that note the textured finish prevents you from easily sliding it around your hand as you position for optimal angles. My opinion is to buy an IR all metal body unit. They may get dinged up more and look like their beat badly in only a matter of months, however they deliver better air control and are much easier to clean and the slimmer body make them more adaptable to changes to body position.
customer_reviews.author: matthew lammey

customer_reviews.title: Product not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: There is no 1/8" collet included. Review update: After using the grinder for 8 hours over a couple of days, I'll give it 4 stars. It's a nice little grinder. The manufacturer confirmed that no 1/8" collect is included or available as an accessory at this time. I purchased an 1/8" collet from AES through Amazon and that works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Value
customer_reviews.text: Major Tool Store chain by my house sells a much worse brand for 40 dollars. This is twice the quality and lasts twice as long for less money. I use them at a used tire store so they can really take a beating. Outstanding item & value
customer_reviews.author: Robert D

customer_reviews.title: Have several hours on it now and still like it. Seems to use less cfm than my ...
customer_reviews.text: Have several hours on it now and still like it. Seems to use less cfm than my other grinders which is great. The lever lock mechanism works much better than some other brands I own. The textured body is nice for comfort and control.
customer_reviews.author: turbojoe62

customer_reviews.title: This lil guy is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: perfect size and speed. I have been using this everyday for months now and have had no problem. The small size lets me get into tight areas and grind or polish comfortably. Would buy again and would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ruehlen

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Not only was this inexpensive, but I've used it a ton and it has held up very well. A little bit of tool oil now and then and even after a year it still works like brand new.
customer_reviews.author: BeauH

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The lock out tab (so if you drop it or set it on it's side it won't turn on) is rather annoying to flip every time you use it. Good safety precaution but kind of a PIA. Built well though. Keeping this one..
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M.

customer_reviews.title: Good grinder
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use at a bicycle shop. We don't use it every day, but it's been holding up nicely. Good sturdy feel in your hand and seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bednarek

customer_reviews.title: Great tool Dewalt tools are quality recently used this on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tool Dewalt tools are quality recently used this on a stainless steel job non stop and had zero issues
customer_reviews.author: José Flores

customer_reviews.title: I mean, for the money? $30 and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I mean, for the money? $30 and it gets the job done. Not a single complaint. (And I've put it to work.)
customer_reviews.author: xnewyorkhardcorex

customer_reviews.title: No Mandrel
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice to use this die grinder out of the box but it doesn't even come with a mandrel!
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: Great product made well by an dependable company Great value for your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tool, I plan on buying the angled die grinder later on.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that you have to use a screw driver to adjust the rpms on it. Price is decent for performance compared to brands like Mac, Snap-on, etc. I use it almost every day. I prefer this one over the harbor freight pneumatic die grinder my employer provided.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than my old ones, Linda gets lost iny hand, will take a little getting used to but works fine

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: Real powerful for its size..bit vice has a nice and strong hold on the disc...

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: love this tool and most of all loved the price.
customer_reviews.author: EdF15E

customer_reviews.title: I use this daily in my line of work, ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily in my line of work, the trigger is a little twitchy, but it has PLENTY of power. For the money, I can't complain in the least.
customer_reviews.author: motuner1

customer_reviews.title: A very well-made Tool DeWalt of course
customer_reviews.text: I have a woodshop and do a lot of remodeling the straight die grinder comes in very handy. It fits in my hand very well and has lots of power I love it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Way faster then my old one and bogs down way less when cutting
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Description
customer_reviews.text: Item description states "1/4" and 1/8" collets", but no 1/8" collet was included. Upon looking at other reviews, it appears that other customers have also been deceived by this dating back 3+ years and yet the misleading statement has remained unchanged. Otherwise a great product for the price: second one we've purchased for our shop.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy T.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool.
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is. I wish it was angled, but then it probably wouldn't be as robust.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: It's deWalt, so you already know it's good
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and performance you can expect from the DeWalt tool brand.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Came in time and in good shape
customer_reviews.text: The product came in perfect condition. The oil bottle was half full. Haven’t tried it out yet but I will tomorrow and give an update.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Pham

customer_reviews.title: Working well after some abuse...I'm happy!
customer_reviews.text: I've beaten on it pretty well by this point, and it's still working just fine. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L.

customer_reviews.title: It's all that.
customer_reviews.text: What a fun-to-use tool! Forget those trips to the dentist when you were a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the safety latch that you have to press first
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the safety latch that you have to press first. I bought an Ironman and I love it. but I have many DeWalt tools and I love the way they work
customer_reviews.author: Winston Randall Earl

customer_reviews.title: Way too loud/seized up
customer_reviews.text: Loudest grinder you can possibly buy, and it seized up despite being oiled every day

customer_reviews.title: Great Die Grinder!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's built pretty damn well, has a solid feel during use, and does a good job!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and works great, should have got one years ago

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool, does twice the work of my last one, and at a higher, stable RPM.

customer_reviews.title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR
customer_reviews.text: Not up to DeWalt quality standards that I am used to. Vibration is uncomfortable and air blows past Collet end.

customer_reviews.title: Loosing way to quick
customer_reviews.text: Was ok at first but bits spin out way to fast

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for 6 months so far in a diesel shop. I've used it with a cut off wheel and with soft pads. Hasn't let me down yet.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is good but the oil bottle that come with it was all over the box it leaked
customer_reviews.author: Kevin catrow

customer_reviews.title: So far it seems perfect for my hobbies
customer_reviews.text: Used it once. So far it seems perfect for my hobbies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have a tiny powerful grinder in my workshop.

customer_reviews.title: ... this daily at my job and it has worked great as I would expect it to being a Dewalt
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily at my job and it has worked great as I would expect it to being a Dewalt

customer_reviews.title: I like the appearance of the tool
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a three star because it did not come with a 1/8" collet as advertised. The oil bottle was 1/4 full and the wrenches to change bits are only 2" long. I like the appearance of the tool, feels got but haven't used it yet.

customer_reviews.title: good but a bit too loud
customer_reviews.text: good excellent grinder, but the only thing that i don't like is how loud it is you need to wear some ear protection when operating this tool
customer_reviews.author: Carcrz

customer_reviews.title: My First phewumatic tool and I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pneumatic grinder. My first! Easy to use and work with. Small enough to get into hard to reach areas. Seems to have plenty of torque and speed (air pressure dependent). Looks like I'll be using more pneumatic tools.
customer_reviews.author: soaknewe (so can you)

customer_reviews.title: Amazon suggested this to add to another purchase I made ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazon suggested this to add to another purchase I made with the 1/4 bits, but this die grinder collet is for larger bits. Make sure you get a smaller collet.
customer_reviews.author: shoppergirl

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT A BRAND TO TRUST
customer_reviews.text: It carries the DEWALT brand so you know what it does...Very helpful in my line of work. It has already paid for itself many times over. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: gary walthall

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price, Not much power
customer_reviews.text: I use it to ream tires for patch plugs with a 6 mm carbide. works fine in my hobby shop but isn't powerful enough for commercial use
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: ... use each day but for small time jobs works great.
customer_reviews.text: Not maked for tons of use each day but for small time jobs works great.
customer_reviews.author: christian horst

customer_reviews.title: Can't loosen collet with wrench
customer_reviews.text: The rubber collar interferes with loosening the collet by wedging against the collet wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Alan of Norcal

customer_reviews.title: Nice grinder, reliable so far.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this die grinder for a while know and absolutely love it. I've used other similar brands but for some reason this seems to have much more torque, it doesn't stall as easily. Very pleased with this purchase and would recommend this as a must have garage item.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: No wrenches included as stated on box.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it works well as it did not come with the wrenches that are supposed to be included in the box. I'll write a good review if you send me the wrenches.
customer_reviews.author: J. Boos

customer_reviews.title: Still holding up.
customer_reviews.text: I dont recall the time I purchased it but it's been more then a year now. Still holding up and running great. Needs a little more hp when having to cut a semi tire that's wrapped around a axle. But handles 16- 20 gauge mild steel just fine. Cant go wrong with Dewalt!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A. Hernandez

product_meta.title: DEWALT Die Grinder, Straight (DWMT70783)
product_meta.description: DEWALT DWMT70783 Straight Die Grinder features a light weight aluminum body with an ergonomically designed cushion grip for user comfort and ease. This grinder has a touch control trigger for easy user control. It has a 1/4" air inlet, works with 1/4" and 1/8" collets, and a safety throttle lever for protection. The DWMT70783 grinder offers rear air exhaust to direct away from the tool. It operates at a speed of up to 25,000 RPM. It is backed by Dewalt's 3 year limited manufacturers warranty.
